--- select_singer_with_in_and_unnest.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers
WHERE
  SingerId IN UNNEST(ARRAY[1, 2, 3])

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.TableName{
        Table: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 18,
          NameEnd: 25,
          Name:    "Singers",
        },
        Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
        As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
        Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where: &ast.Where{
      Where: 26,
      Expr:  &ast.InExpr{
        Not:  false,
        Left: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 34,
          NameEnd: 42,
          Name:    "SingerId",
        },
        Right: &ast.UnnestInCondition{
          Unnest: 46,
          Rparen: 67,
          Expr:   &ast.ArrayLiteral{
            Array:  53,
            Lbrack: 58,
            Rbrack: 66,
            Type:   nil,
            Values: []ast.Expr{
              &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 59,
                ValueEnd: 60,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "1",
              },
              &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 62,
                ValueEnd: 63,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "2",
              },
              &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 65,
                ValueEnd: 66,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "3",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers WHERE SingerId IN UNNEST(ARRAY[1, 2, 3])
